page.title: 14A DAIRY FARMER'S DAY FOXTON
page.content:
0500_Rise and bring in the cows for milking.While the cows are being milked by machine I feed the other livestock,calves,chickens and sheep.
0800_Breakfast In Winter I take a lot longer to feed and look after the animals as all the bedding straw has to be taken to the fields so breakfast is at 1000hrs. 1300_Lunch The jobs I do each day include some or all of the following, Mucking out the sheds Driving the tractor Manuring and Fertilizing Making sileage(winter food) Haymaking Milking Feeding and Watering the animals.
